Package hms.pharmacist

Class Medication

Object
Medication
public class Medication extends Object
Represents a medication in the pharmacy inventory system. Tracks medication details such as stock levels, low stock alert levels, and provides functionality to view and update the inventory.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    lowStockAlertLevel
    The stock level at which an alert should be triggered for low stock.

    private int

    • Medication

      public Medication(String medId, String name, int stockLevel, int lowStockAlertLevel)
      Constructor to initialize a medication object.
      Parameters:
      medId - The unique ID of the medication.
      name - The name of the medication.
      stockLevel - The initial stock level of the medication.
      lowStockAlertLevel - The stock level at which a low stock alert should be triggered.

    • updateStockLevel

      public void updateStockLevel(int newStockLevel)
      Updates the stock level of the medication and checks for low stock warnings.
      Parameters:
      newStockLevel - The new stock level to set. Must be non-negative.

    • setLowStockAlertLevel

      public void setLowStockAlertLevel(int alertLevel)
      Sets the low stock alert level for the medication.
      Parameters:

    • viewMedicationInventory

      public void viewMedicationInventory(List<Map<String,String>> medicineList)
      Displays the inventory of all medications in the system.
      Parameters:
      medicineList - A list of maps containing medication details, such as name, stock levels, and price.
